summary: Richie and Clay saw a very good football game, with one football player chopping the ball back to his foot, which was particularly exciting. Jose has trust in that player.
Fatima is worried about Jenson and Alene. Alene has issues. Lincoln doesn't want Fatima to worry about others too much.
Kelly is scared of sculpture garden figures in Finnland, she finds figure's faces morbid. For Ollie it's Nagoro village in Japan, it's creepy.
Camilla has some errands to do on Saturday. Charles is visiting the German markets this weekend. They are talking about Christmas food and drinks.
Miro speaks Albanian with his parents. His family left Albania illegally in 1990s.
Shaldona sends mobile invitations to her wedding, as she has no time to give them in person.
Emily, Kate and Marta are going to the Pub X at the central station today for a drink.
Ela is not taking Harry's phone calls. Cindy calls Ela at Harry's request.
It's raining, so Val and Candy will wait half an hour before they go.
Maya will buy 5 packs of earplugs for Randolph at the pharmacy.
Tina has to learn Demi's approach how to transfer from hating men to dating them.
Tomas, Sierra and Jeremy have still not received the grant. Tomas is broke and is checking his bank account every hour. Sierra offers to lend him some money.
Blair and Chuck are going to meet the wedding planner after work at Nonna Rita's. The tagliatelle served at Nonna Rita's are very good.
Tom will meet Ben in the Oval Room at 2pm and tells him to bring the papers.
Kate, Milena and Regina's presentation went well. Three people came to listen to them.
Javier was initially eager to have a tatoo done at Warsaw Ink but the price turned out to be too high. Javier decided to have a tatoo done in Colombia.
Jack and May will drink cocktails later.
Mary ran out of money. Carter is going to lend her some in an hour.
Flo cannot get an appointment at the salon until the 6th. Flo worries she's going to be gray. Flo will have to get a touch-up kit at Tesco.
Jessica bought a table, six chairs, a vase and a pile of clothes and the second hand shop downtown. She paid 70 euros for everything.
Christine is sick and won't come to school tomorrow. Annie will leave Theraflu sachets in a mailbox. Christine doesn't want to get her sick.
Mario is waiting on the airport in Luxemburg now.
Jake has got his first TOTW this year. Tom doesn't have a great team.
Bella and Eric dismissed a request of a client. Their boss appreciated the decision. He brings in new clients.
Chelsea won a game with Huddersfield this afternoon. Higuain scored twice. Damian's happy about it and he hopes it will be a turning point for Chelsea.
Lily spent an amazing night with Thomas. Thomas is Romanian and comes from a very rich family.
Julia will call Ronald when she gets back. He has something to tell her.
James is heading to work so he's not watching the game.
Sean believes his spirit animal is a tortoise and Tiffany's could be a wasp.

A person was beaten and mugged on campus and had to be hospitalised. The attacker wore a mask. An official statement will be released, along with a newspaper article. Truman and Rodney think the campus security is subpar, even though there are cameras around.
Lucian is not at home. Desiree wants Lucian to keep her pasta in the microwave.
The temperatures where Thomas stays are -3 at night. There is frost in the morning. Zoey is in the tropics. Thomas had a walk around Belchen's summit on Sunday.
Brook wants Gyle to come and see what happened yesterday.
Dan,Tim, Chris and Martin will meet at 8. Dan and Martin will take it easy this time. Tom can't make it as he has a party at in-laws.
Payton provides Max with websites selling clothes. Payton likes browsing and trying on the clothes but not necessarily buying them. Payton usually buys clothes and books as he loves reading.
Ainsley is sick, so she's not able to help Jane with her thesis now.
Simon will talk to Adrian in 5 minutes.
Bart didn't do well this semester because he didn't study much. He played a lot fo StarCraft. Adrian did well thanks to paying attention in class
Lisa isn't going home yet. Daisy wants her to be back before 11 p.m.
Ken is trying to play a prank on Greg.
Peter has been working out at the gym near their office lately to improve his health. Lisa is considering working out and eating better to be healthier.
Cael lets Mae know that the dress isn't ready yet.
Natalie is pregnant with Dave. Jane didn't think Sally should share it with others as Natalie told them that in confidence. Henriette and Greg are surprised that the father is Dave not Mike.
Elliot can't talk to Jordan now, he's busy. He'll call him back at 8 pm. Jordan is going to Brad's funeral. He had liver cancer.

Chae-yeong and Arthur inform Mariana that the readings for the next session of Stephen's seminar weren't available in the print shop on Monday. Rita decides to go and chcek if the situation's changed tomorrow and she'll let everyone know.
According to Jacky, David did the right thing taking the blame. They will talk when Jack comes back home.
Steve is happy that he got a new dishwasher installed.
Cindy is sad, but doesn't want to talk about the reason. Ellie hasn't seen the funny video that went viral.
Cass sent her grandson Jordan £20 and a birthday card for his 11th birthday.
Conrad can't enter the house because he forgot his keys. Since Rebecca and Tiffany are coming back late, he'll wait in the coffee shop.
Joseph has sent Ella a photo of Wujek Janek's twin baby cows. Ella is delighted.

Josie finds Eco's novel "Foucault's Pendulum" nerdy. Josie would like to read Eco in Italian, but she's unsure of her language abilities. Stefano considers Eco's two novels and finds them difficult. Josie has read an unfavorable review of "Foucault's Pendulum" by Salman Rushdie.
Rob wants to start doing 30 minutes of physical activity every day. Greg is already doing 60 minutes. Anna wants to start exercising just like Rob.
Martin will get Alex two bottles of milk after he finishes the project.
Mico and Jeff will go to the village party. Jeff will drive.
Jill did 20 or 30 so far, 3-4 per day, 40 or 35 hours, so the same as Ally.
Ryan and Sebastian are worried about the political situation in Ukraine.
Cole and Luis are sitting in the same room and yet they're texting each other.
Jerry will be home in 40 minutes.
Ed, Valerie, Chris, Lor, Atnee, Jessica, Matt are laughing at the sinfulness of the sex without marriage.
Simon and Charlie admire Poland for its anti-immigration policy and the way it defends its values and interests.

Julia was at cafe Kohaku near Covent Garden last week, but it's closed down now to her and Henry's surprise. She contacted the owners, but they haven't replied yet. Henry and his cousin went to the Lily's in the end, but it had a different vibe.

Marleen will be leaving in half an hour to go to town. She will get a present for Rita - silk kerchief with a yellow pattern from Kaiser's. It costs 39, and Barley will share the cost 50/50 with Marleen.
Miranda called Tom yesterday and spoke to him in a sweet way. Anne is angry with her because Anne is dating Tom.
Kate is buying apples for herself and George. They have to wait for tangerines until next week.
Linda and Laura are going to an Italian restaurant tomorrow.
Adele got a new biscuit Labrador Chewy that is 4 months. Her cats keep their distance, and Poppy and Lulu seem to mother Chewy and Speedy wants to play.
Ziggler will bring the passport tomorrow as reminded by Dolph.
Today Mary didn't go to school, she stayed at home.
Carly and Cindy think she is stupid, because she asked him.

Dima's laptop is broken, as her cat spilled coffee on the laptop. Dima is worried, because she has to deliver a translation for Trados tomorrow. Dima will come to Nada in an hour to borrow Nada's laptop.
Finn and Zadie are going to Elephant and Castle tomorrow at 2. They will meet at the main entrance.
Adelle has to clean the hamster cage after school.
James informs that the next ASEEES conference will be held in San Francisco. Chloe was hoping for Hawaii. James doesn't think there will be a conference in Hawaii soon due to the high cost of travel.
Mike is in London.
Camilla and Tom will go to Dublin this weekend.
Gab wants to meet Kat in real life. Kat doesn't like Gab's insisting so she won't to talk to him at all.
Jason had a dental appointment today and that's why he was absent.
Ben won't go with Catherine to visit uncle Steve. He will visit her and the boys.
Jake reserved 3 tickets for tomorrow 7 pm. He got 30% discount.
William is making spaghetti. Olivia will buy fresh tomatoes for William. Beth will buy chocolate.
